description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take on the role of Slug a freelance inter-galatic repossessions agent as you track down, board, and shut down rogue space ships, regardless of protest.  Features:  - 12 levels of action packed fun, across three unique ships.  - Unique environmental hazards ranging from blasting flamethrowers and bubbling plasma, to disintegrating pulse barriers.   - Rocking Pixel art.  - Chiptunes!
